original_solution_mapping.L1: The salon made $200.00 and they charge $20.00 per client so there are 200/20 = <<200/20=10>>10 clients in the salon
original_solution_mapping.L2: There are 210 fingers in the salon and everyone has 10 fingers so there are 210/10 = <<210/10=21>>21 people in the salon
original_solution_mapping.L3: If there are 21 people in the salon and 10 are clients then there are 21-10 = <<21-10=11>>11 people in the salon that are not clients

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 2880.
    Returns: the number of people in the salon who are not clients.
    """
    # L1
    total_made = 200.00 # salon made $200.00
    cost_per_client = 20.00 # $20.00 per client
    num_clients = total_made / cost_per_client

    # L2
    total_fingers = 210 # 210 fingers in the salon
    fingers_per_person = 10 # everyone has 10 fingers
    total_people = total_fingers / fingers_per_person

    # L3
    non_clients = total_people - num_clients

    # FA
    answer = non_clients
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: The salon made ${total_made}.00 and they charge ${cost_per_client}.00 per client so there are {total_made}/{cost_per_client} = <<{total_made}/{cost_per_client}={num_clients}>>{num_clients} clients in the salon

There are {total_fingers} fingers in the salon and everyone has {fingers_per_person} fingers so there are {total_fingers}/{fingers_per_person} = <<{total_fingers}/{fingers_per_person}={total_people}>>{total_people} people in the salon

If there are {total_people} people in the salon and {num_clients} are clients then there are {total_people}-{num_clients} = <<{total_people}-{num_clients}={non_clients}>>{non_clients} people in the salon that are not clients

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: The salon made $200.00 and they charge $20.00 per client so there are 200/20 = <<200/20=10>>10 clients in the salon
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: There are 210 fingers in the salon and everyone has 10 fingers so there are 210/10 = <<210/10=2100>>2100 people in the salon
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: If there are 2100 people in the salon and 10 are clients then there are 2100-10 = <<2100-10=2090>>2090 people in the salon that are not clients

explanation: Incorrect operation. The calculation should use '/' but used '*' instead.
